DOC.brief_summary: A retrospective chart review study of Philadelphia chromosome-negative R/R ALL patients in the US.
DOC.brief_title: An Study of Patients With Ph- Chromosome-negative Relapsed or Refractory Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia in the US
DOC.criteria: Medical records of patients initiating treatment for Ph R/R ALL at participating clinical centers in the US between June 2014 and December 2016 will be eligible for inclusion. Medical records of patients with Ph+ ALL will be excluded If informed consent is required, medical records of patients who do not provide informed consent will be excluded
